transfer(address,uint256,(uint8,bytes[]).details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.amount: The amount of tokens we want to transfer
params.currency_address: The ERC20 address of the currency we want to transfer
params.destination: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain Selector: b9f813ff

transfer_multi_assets(((uint8,bytes[]),u.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.assets: The assets we want to transfer, defined by their location and amount.
params.destination: The Multilocation to which we want to send the tokens
params.fee_item: Which of the currencies to be used as fee
params.weight: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain Selector: b38c60fa

transfer_multi_currencies((address,uint2.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.currencies: The currencies we want to transfer, defined by their address and amount.
params.destination: The Multilocation to which we want to send the tokens
params.fee_item: Which of the currencies to be used as fee
params.weight: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain Selector: 8a362d5c

transfer_multiasset((uint8,bytes[]),uint.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.amount: The amount of tokens we want to transfer
params.asset: The asset we want to transfer, defined by its multilocation. Currently only Concrete Fungible assets
params.destination: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain Selector: b38c60fa

transfer_multiasset_with_fee((uint8,byte.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.amount: The amount of tokens we want to transfer
params.asset: The asset we want to transfer, defined by its multilocation. Currently only Concrete Fungible assets
params.destination: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain Selector: 89a570fc

transfer_with_fee(address,uint256,uint25.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.amount: The amount of tokens we want to transfer
params.currency_address: The ERC20 address of the currency we want to transfer
params.destination: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain

devdoc.title: Xtokens Interface The interface through which solidity contracts will interact with xtokens pallet Address :    0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000804

transfer(address,uint256,(uint8,bytes[]).notice: Transfer a token through XCM based on its currencyId
